title: [Large-Scale] Systems Thinking and Change Management: Deep Learning Through Film

context.prior_knowledge: Basic systems theory and organizational change concepts
context.additional_context: Conducting film analysis and collaborative activities using digital devices (laptops, tablets)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze movie-based cases to explain interconnectivity among system components.
Learners can propose stakeholder perspective-based change management strategies through movie discussions.
Learners can design systemic problem-solving solutions for real-world organizations using the film metaphor.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
